title: Music Lessons
text: Luciano Rowlands is a music teacher with over 30 years of experience in singing, composition, music theory and ear training, piano, keyboard, and guitar. He currently offers online lessons, integrating his teaching with the Nuna Vivi Philosophy and producing increasingly original teaching material. Lessons are available in Portuguese and Spanish, with English and French coming soon.
call-to-action: Get in touch to book your lesson and start developing your musical potential!
